text: Duplicate charge refunds: If you were charged twice for the same order, contact support with the order ID and charge timestamps. Refunds are issued within 5–7 business days after confirmation.
Refund processing time: After refund confirmation, refunds are issued within 5–7 business days depending on the payment method.
Receipts & invoices: We can provide receipts and invoices for completed orders. Share your order ID and the email used at checkout.
Payment storage: We do not store full card numbers. Payments are processed via a PCI-compliant provider. We may store card brand and last 4 digits for receipts.
Chargebacks: Please contact support before initiating a chargeback. Chargebacks may pause account access while we investigate.
Subscription cancellation: You can cancel anytime. If you were charged after cancellation, share cancellation timestamp and invoice ID for review.
Shipping tracking: If your order shipped, we provide a tracking link. Share your order ID and delivery postcode.
Shipping delays: Delays can happen due to carrier issues. If your delivery is delayed beyond the estimated window, share your order ID to investigate.
Returns: Eligible items can be returned within 14 days of delivery if unused and in original packaging. Provide order ID and reason.
Data deletion: You can request account/data deletion. We verify identity before processing. Some records may be retained for legal/compliance reasons.
Data access request: You can request a copy of your personal data. We verify identity and respond within the stated SLA.
Support SLA: Standard issues within 24 hours. Payment/billing issues within 2 hours. Security/privacy requests are prioritized.
Account security: If you suspect account compromise, reset password immediately, enable MFA if available, and contact support for account review.
Escalate immediately for suspected fraud, account takeover, legal/privacy requests, or repeated payment failures after basic troubleshooting.
To help quickly, include: order ID, email used at checkout, timestamps, amount charged, and screenshots of the transaction if possible.
